price: 我的宗族啊！今世的生活，只是一种享受，后世才是安宅。
arabic: يَٰقَوۡمِ إِنَّمَا هَٰذِهِ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا مَتَٰعٞ وَإِنَّ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةَ هِيَ دَارُ ٱلۡقَرَارِ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: yāqawmi innamā hādhihi al-ḥayatu al-dun'yā matāʿun wa-inna al-ākhirata hiya dāru al-qarāri
